name: Mingming Fan 0001
content: Mingming Fan, Ph.D. Top Mingming Fan, Ph.D. About Paper Awards Research Services Teaching Mingming Fan is an Associate Professor (with tenure) in Computational Media and Arts Thrust and Internet of Things Thrust at The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou) (HKUST(GZ)), with a joint appointment in HKUST. He earned a Ph.D. from Department of Computer Science at the University of Toronto. He leads Augmenting People via Empowering X (APEX) Group to conduct Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) research by exploring the design principles, interaction techniques and applications of Accessibile Computing, Human-AI Interaction and VR/AR/MR, in particular for addressing aging, accessibility, and education/learning challenges. His group publishes scientific papers in top venues in HCI and has won Best Paper Award, Oustanding Paper Award, and Honorable Mention Award from CHI, ACM Multimedia, UbiComp and Chinese CHI as well as a Best Artefact Award from ASSETS. He regularly serves in various roles for top HCI venues, such as CHI, TOCHI, IMWUT, CSCW, UIST, ASSETS and DIS. 范明明，现任香港科技大学（广州）计算媒体与艺术学域和物联网学域长聘副教授、博士生导师，香港科技大学综合系统与设计系合聘副教授。于多伦多大学计算机科学系获博士学位。研究领域智能人机交互，主要研究方向：1）无障碍赋能技术(Assistive Technology)；2）人智交互（Human-AI Interaction)；3）虚拟与增强现实(VR/AR/MR)。已发表中国计算机学会（CCF）推荐A类（CCF A）期刊与会议论文80余篇，获国际论文奖10余次，包括人机交互顶会ACM CHI“最佳论文奖”与“最佳论文荣誉提名奖”(4次)、ACM Multimedia“杰出论文奖”与“最佳论文荣誉提名奖”、ACM UbiComp“最佳论文荣誉提名奖”等 。获华人华侨人机交互协会“Young Pioneer Award”，入选首届CCF人机交互专委“青年科技激励计划”。长期服务于国际与国内人机交互社区，如ACM ASSETS 2026程序委员会主席，ACM CHI子委员会主席(Subcommittee Chair)，IMWUT和CSCW论文奖评委，CCF人机交互专委执行委员，CCF虚拟现实与可视化技术专委委员，CCF普适计算专委委员，中国残疾人康复协会康复工程与辅具技术专业委员会委员等。 Paper Awards ACM MM 2025 Outstanding Paper Award Proposed and studied four interaction modes for AI
